name: DP203 New Labs - Lab 9 - Post Load Optimization Visualization

content.query:
--PRIOR TO POST LOAD OPTIMIZATION we can create a view that shows our current situation for all tables
--For example, in this newly created view we can compare the value of COMPRESSED_rowgroup_count to the row_count_per_distribution_MAX

SELECT TOP (100) [execution_date]
,[database_name]
,[schema_name]
,[table_name]
,[table_partition_count]
,[row_count_total]
,[row_count_per_distribution_MAX]
,[rowgroup_per_distribution_MAX]
,[INVISIBLE_rowgroup_count]
,[INVISIBLE_rowgroup_rows]
,[INVISIBLE_rowgroup_rows_MIN]
,[INVISIBLE_rowgroup_rows_MAX]
,[INVISIBLE_rowgroup_rows_AVG]
,[OPEN_rowgroup_count]
,[OPEN_rowgroup_rows]
,[OPEN_rowgroup_rows_MIN]
,[OPEN_rowgroup_rows_MAX]
,[OPEN_rowgroup_rows_AVG]
,[CLOSED_rowgroup_count]
,[CLOSED_rowgroup_rows]
,[CLOSED_rowgroup_rows_MIN]
,[CLOSED_rowgroup_rows_MAX]
,[CLOSED_rowgroup_rows_AVG]
,[COMPRESSED_rowgroup_count]
,[COMPRESSED_rowgroup_rows]
,[COMPRESSED_rowgroup_rows_DELETED]
,[COMPRESSED_rowgroup_rows_MIN]
,[COMPRESSED_rowgroup_rows_MAX]
,[COMPRESSED_rowgroup_rows_AVG]
,[Rebuild_Index_SQL]
 FROM [dbo].[vColumnstoreDensity]
